Geology AI

Instantly identify rocks and minerals, learn about their properties, understand how formations look they way they are and create high-quality pencil sketches.

Download on the App Store See features Privacy policy

Geology AI helps you explore the world beneath your feet. Designed to be a toolkit to accompany you in the field or lab, simply snap a photo of a rock or mineral, and the app will identify it using advanced AI, giving information about its formation, uses, and characteristics. Need help working out why an anticline appears tilted? Snap a picture! Perfect for students, hikers, collectors, and anyone curious about the Earth’s treasures.

Why you’ll love it

AI-powered identification

Snap or upload a photo for instant, confident identification of rocks and minerals—powered by advanced AI.

Detailed learning

Explore concise, accessible info on each specimen: formation, composition, uses, and fun facts.

Pencil Sketches

Generate beautiful pencil sketches in seconds, with the option to label key features for clarity.

No knowledge required!

No geology degree needed—just your phone and curiosity to start exploring the world beneath your feet.

Formation Analysis

Reveal geological structures in your photos—bedding planes, faults, folds, and more—with expert-level explanations.

Privacy-first

You control your data and photos. Enjoy a clear privacy policy and easy-to-use controls for peace of mind.

How it works

  1. Capture: Open Geology AI and take a photo of a rock or mineral, or select one from your library.
  2. Identify: The app analyzes visual features and suggests the most likely match, with details and facts.
  3. Learn: Read about the specimen’s properties, formation, and uses.
  4. Sketch: Create a pencil sketch of the rock/mineral or formation and auto-label key features.

Screenshots

Get Geology AI

FAQ

Does Geology AI work offline?

An internet connection is required for identification and accessing community features. You can still take photos for later identification.

Are my photos public by default?

No. You choose whether to share your finds with the community or keep them private in your collection.

Which devices are supported?

Geology AI runs on iPhone and iPad with recent iOS/iPadOS versions. See the App Store for details.

How is my data handled?

Your privacy is a priority. Read the Privacy Policy for full details.

Is Geology AI free?

You can use the app for free with limited uploads. Unlimited identification and advanced features are available via subscription.

Support

Questions or feedback? Email cloud.point88@gmail.com.
